nodes.text: Bet'nih was a Force-sensitive female Chiss who served as an ozyly-esehembo within the Chiss Ascendancy. During the Nikardun campaigns, she served as the navigator for the Chiss heavy cruiser Grayshrike under the command of Senior Captain Xodlak'in'daro.

While on the Grayshrike, Bet'nih was assigned the caregiver Soomret. At one point during their travels, Lakinda tried to bribe Bet'nih into navigating faster by giving her a dark cheese favored by both Chiss, but Bet'nih navigated no faster after eating the cheese.
